00022 #ifndef _LINEARLEASTSQUARES_HPP_
00023 #define _LINEARLEASTSQUARES_HPP_
00024 
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 
00027 #include "LinearSolver.hpp"
00028 
00029 #include "Types.hpp"
00030 
00031 namespace pwiz {
00032 namespace math {
00033 
00034 enum LinearLeastSquaresType {LinearLeastSquaresType_LU, LinearLeastSquaresType_QR};
00035 
00036 template <LinearLeastSquaresType lls_type = LinearLeastSquaresType_LU>
00037 class LinearLeastSquares;
00038 
00039 template<>
00040 class LinearLeastSquares<LinearLeastSquaresType_LU>
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     template<typename T>
00044     boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T> solve(const boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<T>& A,
00045                            const boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T>& y)
00046     {
00047         boost::numeric::ublas::permutation_matrix<std::size_t> m(A.size1());
00048         boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<T> AtA = prod(trans(A), A);
00049         boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T> b = y;
00050         boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T> r;
00051 
00052         // This serves as a sanity check. Note that an exception here
00053         // probably indicates a data file error.
00054         if (boost::numeric::ublas::lu_factorize(AtA, m) == 0.)
00055         {
00056             r = prod(trans(A), b);
00057 
00058             boost::numeric::ublas::lu_substitute(AtA, m, r);
00059         }
00060 
00061         return r;
00062     }
00063 };
00064 
00065 template<>
00066 class LinearLeastSquares<LinearLeastSquaresType_QR>
00067 {
00068 public:
00069 
00070     template<typename T>
00071     boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T> solve(
00072         const boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<T>& A,
00073         const boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T>& x)
00074     {
00075         LinearSolver<LinearSolverType_QR> solver;
00076 
00077         boost::numeric::ublas::vector<T> y = solver.solve(A, x);
00078 
00079         return y;
00080     }
00081 };
00082 
00083 }
00084 }
00085 
00086 #endif // _LINEARLEASTSQUARES_HPP_
